contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 6th day of August, 2014, in response to the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tune, this matter is REMANDED to the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County for the appointment of new counsel within 60 days of this order. New counsel shall file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 30 days of appointment.
